author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: WATCH: India vs New Zealand, third hockey Test
text:
India take on hosts New Zealand in the third Test of the four-match series in Christchurch today.
On Wednesday, Indian men's hockey bounced back strongly and defeated New Zealand 3-1 in the second Test to level the series 1-1 in their ongoing tour to the Kiwi land.
India lost the series opener 0-2 against the Kiwis.
